title: (x) The Sound of Music - hand lettered
content:
Can anyone identify this typeface, or know of one similar?   
I assume it was originally handrawn specifically for this. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070225160611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48430.jpg)
author: simon71

comments.content: Wow a blast from the past. A great musical and it is definately hand lettered. Way before digitalization. Doe a deer a female deerï¿½
